mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message_content(msg_id, create_time, update_time, msg_status, exchange, routing_key, err_cause, order_no, max_retry, current_retry, product_no) VALUES (#{msgId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{msgStatus}, #{exchange}, #{routingKey}, #{errCause}, #{orderNo}, #{maxRetry}, #{currentRetry}, #{productNo})
mapper.update:
update message_content
update_time=#{updateTime},
msg_status=#{msgStatus},
err_cause=#{errCause}
WHERE msg_id=#{msgId} AND
current_retry<max_retry
